00010 #ifndef BOOST_ASSIGN_V2_CHAIN_CHECKING_TWIN_VALUES_ER_2010_HPP
00011 #define BOOST_ASSIGN_V2_CHAIN_CHECKING_TWIN_VALUES_ER_2010_HPP
00012 #include <boost/static_assert.hpp>
00013 #include <vector>
00014 #include <boost/mpl/eval_if.hpp>
00015 #include <boost/mpl/identity.hpp>
00016 #include <boost/assign/v2/detail/checking/range.hpp>
00017 #include <boost/assign/v2/ref/detail/unwrap/range.hpp>
00018 #include <boost/assign/v2/ref/wrapper/copy.hpp>
00019 #include <boost/assign/v2/chain/traits/use_lvalue.hpp>
00020 #include <boost/assign/v2/chain/chain.hpp>
00021 
00022 namespace boost{
00023 namespace assign{ 
00024 namespace v2{
00025 namespace checking{
00026 namespace chain{
00027 namespace twin_values{
00028 
00029 #define BOOST_ASSIGN_V2_CHAIN_CHECKING_mpl_inner( the_value )\
00030     typedef v2::chain_traits::use_lvalue<cr1_, cr2_ >  use_lvalue_; \
00031     BOOST_STATIC_ASSERT( use_lvalue_::value == the_value ); \
00032     typedef typename boost::mpl::eval_if_c< \
00033         the_value, \
00034         boost::mpl::identity<boost::mpl::void_>, \
00035         v2::result_of::chain<cr1_, cr2_> \
00036     >::type result_; \
00037 
00038 
00039 #define BOOST_ASSIGN_V2_CHAIN_CHECKING_mpl(qual_v1, qual_e2, qual_v2, \
00040                                                                   the_value )\
00041    { \
00042         typedef std::vector<T> qual_v1 vec1_; \
00043                 typedef typename assign::v2::ref::type_traits::copy_wrapper< \
00044                 T qual_e2>::type w_; \
00045         typedef std::vector<w_> qual_v2 vec2_; \
00046                 typedef typename ref::result_of::unwrap_range<vec1_>::type r1_; \
00047                 typedef typename ref::result_of::unwrap_range<vec2_>::type r2_; \
00048         {  \
00049             typedef r1_       cr1_;\
00050             typedef r2_       cr2_;\
00051             BOOST_ASSIGN_V2_CHAIN_CHECKING_mpl_inner(the_value) \
00052         } \
00053         {  \
00054             typedef r1_       cr1_;\
00055             typedef r2_       cr2_;\
00056             BOOST_ASSIGN_V2_CHAIN_CHECKING_mpl_inner(the_value) \
00057         } \
00058         {  \
00059             typedef r1_       cr1_;\
00060             typedef r2_ const cr2_;\
00061             BOOST_ASSIGN_V2_CHAIN_CHECKING_mpl_inner(the_value) \
00062         } \
00063         {  \
00064             typedef r1_ const cr1_;\
00065             typedef r2_       cr2_;\
00066             BOOST_ASSIGN_V2_CHAIN_CHECKING_mpl_inner(the_value) \
00067         } \
00068         {  \
00069             typedef r1_ const cr1_;\
00070             typedef r2_ const cr2_;\
00071             BOOST_ASSIGN_V2_CHAIN_CHECKING_mpl_inner(the_value) \
00072         } \
00073     } \
00074    
00075 
00076     template<typename T>
00077     void do_check()
00078     {   
00079         // mpl checks
00080         {
00081                 typedef std::vector<T> vec_;
00082                 typedef v2::result_of::chain<vec_,vec_> caller1_;
00083                 typedef typename caller1_::type range1_;
00084                 typedef typename boost::range_reference<range1_>::type ref1_;
00085                 typedef boost::is_same<ref1_,T&> is_same1_;
00086                 BOOST_STATIC_ASSERT(is_same1_::value);
00087                 typedef v2::result_of::chain<range1_ const,vec_> caller2_;
00088                 typedef typename caller2_::type range2_;
00089                 typedef typename boost::range_reference<range2_>::type ref2_;
00090                 typedef boost::is_same<ref2_,T &> is_same2_; 
00091                 BOOST_STATIC_ASSERT(is_same2_::value);
00092             }
00093 //                                (qual_v1, qual_e2 , qual_v2 , the_value)
00094 BOOST_ASSIGN_V2_CHAIN_CHECKING_mpl(       ,         ,         , true     )
00095 BOOST_ASSIGN_V2_CHAIN_CHECKING_mpl(       ,         , const   , true     )
00096 BOOST_ASSIGN_V2_CHAIN_CHECKING_mpl(       , const   ,         , false    )
00097 BOOST_ASSIGN_V2_CHAIN_CHECKING_mpl(       , const   , const   , false    )
00098 BOOST_ASSIGN_V2_CHAIN_CHECKING_mpl( const ,         ,         , false    )
00099 BOOST_ASSIGN_V2_CHAIN_CHECKING_mpl( const ,         , const   , false    )
00100 BOOST_ASSIGN_V2_CHAIN_CHECKING_mpl( const , const   ,         , false    )
00101 BOOST_ASSIGN_V2_CHAIN_CHECKING_mpl( const , const   , const   , false    )
00102 
00103         // runtime checks
00104         {    
00105                     typedef std::vector<T> vt_;
00106             vt_ vt1( 2 ), vt2( 3 ), vt3( 3 );
00107                         vt_ vt;
00108                 {
00109                         namespace ns = v2::checking::constants;
00110                 vt.push_back( ns::a );
00111                 vt.push_back( ns::b );
00112                 vt.push_back( ns::c );
00113                 vt.push_back( ns::d );
00114                 vt.push_back( ns::e );
00115                 vt.push_back( ns::f );
00116                 vt.push_back( ns::g );
00117                 vt.push_back( ns::h );
00118                 {
00119                         using namespace adaptor;
00120                         boost::copy( 
00121                                 vt, 
00122                         boost::begin( vt1 | _chain( vt2 ) | _chain( vt3 ))
00123                         );
00124                 }
00125                 {
00126                         using namespace adaptor;
00127                         typedef v2::container_tag::range tag_;
00128                     v2::checking::do_check( 
00129                         tag_(), 
00130                         vt1 | _chain( vt2 ) | _chain( vt3 )
00131                     );
00132                 }
00133                 }
00134             {
00135                     T a1 , b1, c1, d1, e1, f1, g1, h1;
00136 
00137                     typedef typename ref::type_traits::copy_wrapper<T>::type w_;
00138                 typedef boost::is_reference_wrapper<w_> is_;
00139                 
00140                 // TODO std::vector causes problems.
00141                 boost::array<int, 2> vw1;
00142                 boost::array<int, 3> vw2, vw3;
00143                 {
00144                         vw1[ 0 ] = a1 ;
00145                         vw1[ 1 ] = b1 ;
00146                         vw2[ 0 ] = c1 ;
00147                         vw2[ 1 ] = d1 ;
00148                         vw2[ 2 ] = e1 ;
00149                         vw3[ 0 ] = f1 ;
00150                         vw3[ 1 ] = g1 ;
00151                         vw3[ 2 ] = h1 ;
00152                                 }
00153                                 using namespace adaptor;
00154                 boost::copy( 
00155                         vt, 
00156                     boost::begin( vw1 | _chain( vw2 ) | _chain( vw3 ) )
00157                 );
00158                 {
00159                         typedef v2::container_tag::range tag_;
00160                     v2::checking::do_check( 
00161                         tag_(), 
00162                         vw1 | _chain( vw2 ) | _chain( vw3 )
00163                     );
00164                 }
00165                         }
00166         }// runtime checks
00167     }// do_check
00168 
00169 }// twin_values
00170 }// chain
00171 }// checking
00172 }// v2
00173 }// assign
00174 }// boost

00177 #undef BOOST_ASSIGN_V2_CHAIN_CHECKING_mpl
